alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Colbert and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leighton, or 9 miles east of Muscle Shoals, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Town Creek, Leighton, Hatton, La Grange, Ne Smith, Whiteoak and Northwest Alabama Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
